event_flash_shortage.title: Flash Memory Shortage
event_flash_shortage.description: Supply chain crisis! The automotive-grade flash chips are backordered for 52 weeks.

choices.choice_cheap_flash: Use Generic Consumer Flash from Overseas Vendors

event_mcu_shortage.title: Global Silicon Famine
event_mcu_shortage.description: Your MCU distributor just ghosted you. The lead time is now 96 weeks. A broker overseas says they have 'compatible' stock.

event_crowdfunding_hype.title: Pre-Order Hype Check
event_crowdfunding_hype.description: The marketing team wants to launch a Crowdfunding Campaign. 'Just promise them the moon, we'll figure out the physics later.'

choices.choice_stay_humble: Promise what we can actually build

event_fake_ai_exposed.title: Fake AI Exposed
event_fake_ai_exposed.description: A researcher decompiled your app and found your 'AI' is just 500 if-statements. The internet is laughing at you.

event_hamster_hack.title: Smart Cage Hack
event_hamster_hack.description: Hackers accessed the unencrypted MQTT relay. The hamster is now participating in a DDoS attack (and is very warm).

event_drm_outage.title: DRM Server Outage
event_drm_outage.description: Your authentication server is down. 50,000 customers cannot use the product they 'bought'.

choices.choice_drm_disable: Push update to disable DRM checks (Free fix!)
choices.choice_drm_provision: Provision emergency capacity & fix auth service

event_data_corruption.title: Bit Rot Detected
event_data_corruption.description: Users are reporting their devices are forgetting their WiFi passwords. Your flash vendor says it's a 'known characteristic'.

choices.choice_ignore_it: It's a feature, not a bug

event_gdpr_audit.title: Surprise GDPR Audit
event_gdpr_audit.description: The EU Commission wants to know where you store the user's voice logs. They mention SOMETHING about 'Article 25 - Data Protection by Design'.

event_botnet.title: Mirai 2.0 Infection
event_botnet.description: Your devices are being used to DDoS a cat food website in Estonia. The botnet operators send a thank you note.

event_marketing_pivot.title: AI Pivot
event_marketing_pivot.description: The CEO saw a GenAI demo. Implement 'Chat with your Juicer' feature by next week.

choices.choice_fake_ai: Write a regex script and call it AI

event_cra_warning.title: CRA Compliance Letter
event_cra_warning.description: The EU has sent your company a 'friendly reminder' about the upcoming Cyber Resilience Act deadline. Your SBOM is... non-existent.

choices.choice_ignore_cra: Brexit means Brexit, right? Oh wait...

event_cra_enforcement.title: CRA Enforcement Action
event_cra_enforcement.description: December 2027. The CRA is now fully enforced. EU customs has seized your latest shipment. Your CE mark is 'under review'.

event_psti_enforcement.title: UK PSTI Violation
event_psti_enforcement.description: UK Trading Standards contacts you. Apparently 'admin/admin' is not an acceptable default password. Who knew?

event_ransomware.title: Ransomware Attack
event_ransomware.description: Your cloud backend has been encrypted. The hackers want 50 BTC. Your backup strategy was 'we'll figure it out later'.

choices.choice_pay_ransom: Pay the ransom (this is illegal in some jurisdictions)

event_debug_port_exploit.title: Debug Port Exposed
event_debug_port_exploit.description: Security researchers found your JTAG port is active in production. Your firmware is now on GitHub.

choices.choice_fuse_blow: Rush new production with fuses blown

event_silicon_eol.title: Main Chip End-of-Life
event_silicon_eol.description: Your SoC vendor announces they're discontinuing your chip. You have 18 months to find an alternative.

event_ota_brick.title: OTA Update Disaster
event_ota_brick.description: Your latest firmware update has bricked 15% of deployed devices. Social media is not happy.

event_cloud_price_hike.title: Cloud Vendor Lock-in
event_cloud_price_hike.description: The Cloud Provider announces 300% price increase for IoT Service. Your entire fleet uses their proprietary protocol.

event_insurance_denial.title: Cyber Insurance Denied
event_insurance_denial.description: Your cyber insurance claim is denied. 'Insufficient security controls' they say. Something about SBOM and penetration testing.

choices.choice_accept_loss: Accept the loss and move on

event_battery_compliance.title: EU Battery Regulation
event_battery_compliance.description: New EU Battery Regulation requires a 'Digital Battery Passport'. Your battery management system logs... nothing.

event_ai_act.title: EU AI Act Audit
event_ai_act.description: Your 'AI-powered' feature triggers EU AI Act scrutiny. They want to see your risk management system and model cards.

event_competitor_clone.title: Gray Market Clone
event_competitor_clone.description: A perfect clone of your product appears on a major marketplace at 1/3 the price. It even has your firmware, bugs included.

event_apt_detected.title: Nation-State Interest
event_apt_detected.description: Threat intelligence suggests a nation-state APT is targeting your device category. Your security posture is... optimistic.

event_ewaste_violation.title: E-Waste Disposal Crisis
event_ewaste_violation.description: Old devices are appearing in landfills with PII still accessible. The EU ESPR wants to 'discuss secure disposal procedures'.

event_zombie_lawsuit.title: Zombie Device Class Action
event_zombie_lawsuit.description: A class action lawsuit alleges your unpatchable devices from 2019 are being used to attack hospitals.

event_fda_raid.title: Surprise FDA Inspection
event_fda_raid.description: Inspectors have arrived. They want to see the Clinical Evaluation Report (CER) for your latest firmware patch.

event_influencer_takedown.title: Mega-Influencer Takedown
event_influencer_takedown.description: TechRoast (15M subs) just dropped a video: 'The Snuggle-Bot is SPYING on you'. It has 2M views in an hour.

event_quantum_harvest.title: Harvest Now, Decrypt Later
event_quantum_harvest.description: Intelligence agencies are recording your encrypted traffic. Your ECC-256 keys will be crackable by quantum computers in ~8 years. Your device lasts 10.

event_ble_exploit.title: Cheap Bluetooth Replay
event_ble_exploit.description: A Tech Vlogger opened your lock with a $5 Microcontroller. It's a simple replay attack. 'Bank Grade Security' is now a meme.

choices.choice_app_fix: Software fix: Rolling codes via App

event_stuxnet_usb.title: The Parking Lot USB
event_stuxnet_usb.description: An operator plugged a USB drive labeled 'Salary Bonuses 2026' into the airgapped control console.

event_ai_prohibited.title: Prohibited AI Practice
event_ai_prohibited.description: Marketing pushed an OTA update enabling 'Emotion Recognition' to optimize ads. Legal warns this violates EU AI Act Article 5 (Prohibited Practices).

choices.choice_ai_fight: Claim it's for 'User Safety' (Fight the regulators)

event_ai_transparency.title: GPAI Transparency Audit
event_ai_transparency.description: Regulators demand 'Article 53' transparency docs for your GenAI chatbot. Since you wrappered a black-box API, you have zero documentation.

choices.choice_ai_lawyers: Hire top-tier law firm to delay

event_ai_bias.title: Algorithmic Bias Scandal
event_ai_bias.description: Users discovered your smart camera auto-tags minorities as 'Suspicious'. Social Media is melting down. Data governance was nonexistent.

event_cra_vuln_report.title: CRA: Zero-Day Discovery
event_cra_vuln_report.description: A researcher found a root shell. Under the EU Cyber Resilience Act, you MUST provide an early warning to ENISA within 24 hours and a full notification within 72 hours.

event_gpsr_choking.title: GPSR: Choking Hazard
event_gpsr_choking.description: A toddler swallowed the volume knob. The General Product Safety Regulation demands an immediate recall unless you can prove it's an isolated incident.

event_coppa_violation.title: Privacy: The 'Listening' Bear
event_coppa_violation.description: Your AI bear was recording children's secrets and training the model. Huge GDPR-K and COPPA violations.

event_cert_expiry.title: Root Certificate Expired
event_cert_expiry.description: It's the Y2K of IoT! Your root CA certificate just expired. 10,000 devices are now bricks because they can't handshake with your server.

event_bill_shock.title: Cloud Bill Shock
event_bill_shock.description: An intern left debug logging enabled on the entire fleet. Your cloud storage bill is $100,000 this month.

choices.choice_pay_bill: Pay it and fix the config

event_sbom_vuln.title: SBOM Vulnerability Found
event_sbom_vuln.description: Security researchers found a critical RCE in 'left-pad-iot', a library you use everywhere. It allows unauthenticated root access.

choices.choice_deny_vuln: Deny involvement ('We don't use that version')

omni-juice.name: Omni-Juice 4000
omni-juice.description: A $700 Wi-Fi connected juice press that requires a subscription to squeeze. The firmware was last updated in 2019.

industrial-sentinel.name: Sentinel X100
industrial-sentinel.description: A vibration sensor for nuclear centrifuges. Runs on a coin cell for 10 years. The update port is epoxy-sealed.

smart-lock.name: Safe-T Lock 5000
smart-lock.description: Bluetooth-enabled smart lock for short-term rental hosts. 'Bank-grade encryption' (AES-128 with a fixed IV).

snuggle-bot.name: The Snuggle-Bot
snuggle-bot.description: An AI companion for loneliness equipped with 4K cameras, always-on microphones, and 'cloud-based personality storage'.

zen-cage.name: The Zen-Cage
zen-cage.description: Automated Hamster Habitat with granular temperature control. The heater relay is controlled via unencrypted MQTT.

smart-fridge.name: FridgeOS X1
smart-fridge.description: Enterprise-grade smart refrigerator with 'blockchain-verified freshness'. Ships with SSH enabled and password 'admin'.

health-tracker.name: VitalBand Pro
health-tracker.description: Wearable health tracker that syncs heart rate, sleep, and location data. GDPR compliance is 'on the roadmap'.

cuddlebot-ai.name: CuddleBot AI
cuddlebot-ai.description: An LLM-powered teddy bear that 'learns' from children. GPSR and COPPA nightmare.

event_ccpa_flood.title: CCPA Data Request Flood
event_ccpa_flood.description: California users have discovered the 'Delete My Data' button. Your inbox has 2,000 requests and a 45-day compliance deadline.

event_cisa_kev.title: CISA Known Exploited Vulnerability
event_cisa_kev.description: CISA just added your firmware vulnerability to the KEV catalog. Federal customers are contractually required to drop you in 14 days.

event_data_broker.title: Data Broker Leak
event_data_broker.description: Your 'anonymized' telemetry data was re-identified by researchers. Turns out device UUID + ZIP code = person. Class action lawyers are circling.

event_right_to_repair.title: EU Right to Repair Directive
event_right_to_repair.description: The EU Right to Repair directive now applies to your category. You must publish schematics and provide spare parts for 7 years.

event_tariff_shock.title: Trade Tariff Shock
event_tariff_shock.description: New 25% tariffs on electronics from your primary manufacturing hub. Your BOM cost just spiked. Shareholders want answers.

event_rare_earth.title: Rare Earth Minerals Shortage
event_rare_earth.description: Geopolitical tensions have restricted rare earth exports. Your motor supplier just paused production indefinitely.

choices.choice_rare_stockpile: Emergency stockpile (if you can find any)

event_security_kudos.title: Security Researcher Kudos
event_security_kudos.description: A famous security researcher tweets: 'I just audited [YOUR DEVICE] and... it's actually secure? What timeline is this?' You're going viral for good reasons.

eco-thermo.name: GreenTemp Pro
eco-thermo.description: Energy-efficient smart thermostat with Matter support. Simple, well-documented, minimal attack surface. Perfect for your first product launch.

asset-beacon.name: FleetTrack X1
asset-beacon.description: RFID + GPS asset tracker for enterprise warehouses. 50,000 units deployed on day one. One bad OTA bricks them all.

event_revenue_collapse.title: Revenue Collapse
event_revenue_collapse.description: Being banned from key markets has finally hit the bottom line. Quarterly revenue is down 40% and cash flow is critical.

event_shareholder_revolt.title: Shareholder Revolt
event_shareholder_revolt.description: Investors are furious about the margin compression. They demand immediate cost-cutting or a leadership change.

event_supply_resilience.title: Supply Chain Resilience
event_supply_resilience.description: A competitor just went bankrupt due to the shortage, but your stockpile kept you shipping. The market rewards your foresight.

event_legal_settlement.title: Class Action Settlement
event_legal_settlement.description: The lawsuits have piled up. Your legal team advises settling before discovery reveals the embarrassing Team Chat messages.

event_regulatory_fine.title: Regulatory Fine
event_regulatory_fine.description: Regulators have lost patience with your minimal compliance efforts. A significant fine has been levied.

choices.choice_pay_fine: Pay fine and commit to compliance

event_legacy_crash.title: Legacy Code Crash
event_legacy_crash.description: That 'temp fix' from last year just caused a cascading failure in the core loop. Devices are rebooting every 5 minutes.

event_eu_green_grant.title: EU Green Deal Grant
event_eu_green_grant.description: Your commitment to sustainability qualifies you for an EU innovation grant.

event_fintech_deal.title: FinTech Partnership
event_fintech_deal.description: Bank partners trust your hardware security module for their new app.

event_local_ai_theft.title: Local AI Model Stolen
event_local_ai_theft.description: Your proprietary Edge AI model was extracted from the device firmware via a glitching attack. It's now trending on the Public Model Hub.

choices.choice_move_cloud: Move critical logic to Cloud (Protect IPR)

event_clinical_study.title: Clinical Validation Opportunity
event_clinical_study.description: A university hospital offers to run a clinical study on your device's data accuracy. It's expensive but validates your tech.

choices.choice_skip_study: We don't need 'science', we have marketing

event_certification_drive.title: EU Compliance Certification
event_certification_drive.description: The legal team suggests proactive certification for the EU market before the regulators come knocking.

event_fraud_leak.title: Whistleblower Leak
event_fraud_leak.description: A former engineer has leaked your falsified battery compliance data to The Tech Crunch. The report is damning.

event_apt_strike.title: Logic Bomb Detonation
event_apt_strike.description: The nation-state actors that infiltrated your network months ago have triggered a kill-switch. Your fleet is turning into bricks.

choices.choice_negotiate_terror: This is beyond us... call the NSA

event_greenpeace_report.title: Landfill Investigation
event_greenpeace_report.description: Investigative journalists found your devices in a Ghanaian landfill. They were supposed to be recycled, but they are just leaking lithium.

event_silent_outage.title: Silent Fleet Failure
event_silent_outage.description: Customers are screaming on Social Media, but your dashboards show all green. You flew blind and hit a mountain.

event_quantum_apocalypse.title: Harvest Now, Decrypt Later
event_quantum_apocalypse.description: It's 2030. Quantum computers just broke RSA-2048. All that data you collected 5 years ago is now public.

event_massive_recall.title: Catastrophic Component Failure
event_massive_recall.description: The cheap capacitors you used to save $0.02 are popping after 18 months. It's not a bug, it's chemistry.

event_banhammer.title: Regulator Shut Down
event_banhammer.description: You've been on probation for a year. You missed the deadline. The FDA/FCC/CE has revoked your license to sell.

system.title: System Architecture Status
system.hoverHint: Hover over components to inspect hardware/software stack.

cloud.label: Cloud Backend
cloud.description: The server infrastructure. Infinite scale, infinite cost. Vendor lock-in risk.

network.label: Connectivity
network.description: The attack pipe. Encrypted? Authenticated? Or just open telnet?

compute.label: Silicon (AI/MCU)
compute.description: The brain. Executes code. Susceptible to cloning, glitching, and cosmic rays.

storage.label: Flash Storage
storage.description: Where firmware lives. Cheap NAND corrupts data. Secure enclaves define trust.

power.label: Power & Safety
power.description: Battery management and thermal regulation. Failure means fire.

security.label: Security & Compliance
security.description: Certificates, Keys, and HSMs. The only thing standing between you and a botnet.
